Wonderful to welcome #Canadaâ€™s MP delegation soon after the #PLAâ€™s large-scale exercise. We passionately exchanged views on how to counter #Chinaâ€™s coercion & #FIMI. We appreciate the MPsâ€™ strong support for #Taiwanâ€™s security, resilience, & rightful role in the world.

The brave people of #Iran continue to rise up for freedom over tyranny. When I was young, #Taiwan also fought hard to push martial law into history & established liberal democracy. Now our hearts are definitely with the #Iranian protesters.

I have always admired those who rise up against tyranny in pursuit of freedom. Whatâ€™s unfolding in #Iran is a powerful lesson for other dictators, #CRINK or otherwise: people wonâ€™t tolerate oppression forever.

President @ChingteLai spoke out against the #PRCâ€™s sanctions and defended our officials for safeguarding our freedom and national security. As a sanctionee since 2021, I can say this clearly: we will never bow to #Chinaâ€™s transnational repression.

Great to welcome the @Europarl_EN delegation led by @gahler_michael. We had a passionate discussion on the security environment in the #IndoPacific & how #Taiwan & #Europe can strengthen closer ties against authoritarian expansionism.

For those unaware, both @X & #Facebook are banned in #China. Yet the communist regime runs official accounts just to wage information warfare against #Taiwan. Iâ€™m being modest when I describe the #CCP regime as disgusting & sick.

The #CCP is a sick, disgusting regime. Its state media posted @PumaShenâ€™s private info on an official #Facebook page, an act of transnational repression that goes beyond what any society should tolerate. @Meta must take it down, & the #PRC must be condemned. https://t.co/yTadyl5AG0
RT @RepDonBacon: Recent military escalation & provocations by China towards Taiwan underscores why President Trump is right to sell $11B inâ€¦

#Chinaâ€™s military exercises toward #Taiwan & others in the region were designed to intimidate & coerce countries in the #IndoPacific. Theyâ€™re provocative & escalatory. I thank the @StateDept for issuing a statement on New Yearâ€™s Day urging restraint. https://t.co/qT15OTvOiL

At the start of the year, WE PROMISE to stand firm, protect our freedom & defend our sovereignty. #Taiwan is proud & brave. Weâ€™ll never bow to any military intimidation.
